title: Embroidered Picture, 1748
creditline: Bequest of Emily Coe Stowell from the Coe Collection
description: Woman standing on a mound wearing a patterned light blue dress holding a parrot in her right hand and a cherry branch in her left. The figure is surrounded by branching flowers including rose, carnation, morning glory, etc. The letters "M" and "L" appear at the top along with "1748". Embroidery for pattern only.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, 1748.
1748. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: embroidered. Bequest of Emily Coe Stowell from the Coe Collection. 1970-28-19.
